summary.para: The CRYPT_CREDENTIALS structure contains information about credentials that can be passed as optional input to a remote object retrieval function such as or .
The size in bytes of this structure.
A pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the type of credential object represented by the pvCredentials member.
This member can contain the following possible value.

description.para: The pvCredentials member contains a structure that represents a user name and password combination.

summary.para: A pointer to a structure as defined by the pszCredentialsOid member.
